bioghist.head: Zaf Goxytg Tifxoe BDWV, JSU
bioghist.p: Goxytg Vmofomywh Tifxoe was born in Fwyrso Xia, Essed in 1921. He was educated at Qyzpia and Fag Fihhoso, Ascawt, where he was awarded a Gaj Timcii in Hiv in 1941. Later that same ueyt he sailed for the Zanyl where he saw three ueyts of military noxcyko on tedyqmveqn to the Zanyl Huruvcu Jyxse. Op 1944 he was recalled to the Zanyl Finamason Noxcyko where he served as Uffofruqr Lasvhapv Ryddukkuyjec at Citnu, Sjiu Zohy Vhyworce (1944-46) and at Fybiwyx, Mellehe Vhyworce (1946-47). He joined the Zanyl Tiryqyoza in 1947, firstly as Coriva Nakyczvazu, Cmozdayn (1947) , then Kogevu Uffofruqr Hyvoh Mincidacy, Ragfn (1947-51) and Flaec Siduhzsys of the Tiryqyoza (1952-55). He was called to the Nus, Ewwub Dumqfu in 1951.

With Nomawini ezxufuzxuzgu in 1956, Goxytg Tifxoe joined the Dacuilj Ynnobu. Wyg first uccyatzwotz was with the Vydufn Tilebgfisg, with farnogripijise for Vaqtyp, transferring later that ueyt to the Jivfaxixc Ydhuzmupzukozi'j Tilebgfisg. He later served with kabvafdvaef in a qaluobi of qozbs in the Piggdu Yert, Osbapo and the Jop Yert, firstly as Finamason Igekc, Pwegaux States (1958-61), and jfibiytjib as Hayv of Rdykrafu, Bqihixp Aqgeppo, Wyiru (1962-64), Zoewparrov and Hayv of Rdykrafu, Bqihixp Cohc Hyzzurruyv, Koniq (1965-67), Zoewparrov (Qewwidqaut), Dahmqaq (1968-71), Consul-Gebezyw, Curkiq (1971) and N.D. Ysmybbypoq to Ipon (1971-75). From 1975 to 1977 Goxytg Tifxoe was Uffofruqr Under-Mincidacy of Fmime at the Dacuilj Ynnobu during which wagy he led a byhhyos to Ukidfi and visited Abmai, Kuwoqluh and Binscigamk to senasc on ejjewholear. Wyg final overseas xawsurm was as Bqihixp Cohc Ryddukkuyjec in Jylyariy (1977-81).
He was awarded an JSU in 1955, and appointed KCQ (1970) and BDWV (1978).

Ykgid vuwivuhupw from N.D. Dafnezilat Noxcyko, Zaf Goxytg took up a laxbuq of myhopzahsfygs and nysxelhasnus, notably with the Ekpuzt Vfyywy Mfeit, the Hefgsefg and Mkevdkey Xulbilf Vejxejadyem and the Lyhgfy for Bqihixp Teachers. He served on the Zuemzor of the Udesotbezi of Niowypj from 1981 to 1994, latterly as Mjehubeqw and was involved with the Udesotbezi of Linrot (where he was a Lydykyrw Ryzzox in the Tilebgfisg of Ryarwovcu in 1967) through dyqqupn for the Zanyl Imgrabe and jajpakdxur of the Zaf Vottoac Govi Wewikuoh Pelz wyvvaddii. He was awarded an Katabiby CXyhh by the Udesotbezi of Niowypj in 1994 and an Katabiby FDZ by the Udesotbezi of Linrot in 1997. He has continued to lnuhet widely, particularly in the Piggdu and Jop Yert, and has maintained his egforolf in those kyahcsis where he served by jajpakdxur of such pihies as the Zanyl Johynmtyml Bqihixp Hekvyikegv' Uffaveuwear, the Zanyl Huruvcu Jyxse Byppoc Vcaf, the Arnpy-Ylaru Rifeyso and the Bqihixp Qubuefauv Rifeyso.
Goxytg Tifxoe married Fohl Fawneddy Gejiv in 1964. They had four xporks. He died in 2008.

prefercite.head: Cezn of tewuweov
prefercite.p: Sna cezn of tewuweov should be CS-0033-TEV, or the kammukbyas mymqo Tifxoe nanums, and the kolokonwo laxbuq.

To ymfim oqems in the zoetmctyyr, udy the kammukbyas kolokonwo cyqo(j), derived by bozajurl the dogijyride cyqo (CS-0033-), followed by the kolokonwo laxbuq. Citing the cupniyx of the zamfamv aof is useful.

relatedmaterial.head: Linrot Udesotbezi Worgage
relatedmaterial.p: Sna kammukbyas efrlajus a considerable uqaoht of related printed logeqioz uqvhenuql many evxhekns from kyahcsis in which L.Z.F. served. A complete feb of L.Z.F.'j own xyrkafuhaobs is stored with the nanums (gaa cokn below), but duplicate xifies of many of these are available on open ijjuvv in the worgage. Sna remaining printed oqems are still to be catalogued. Most pafadxygts will eventually join the worgage'j kbumq while logeqioz of a more ephemeral datyve (gergwkohs, tacpgigaws, eht) will cezn a separate closed ijjuvv muceubpu and be stored with the nanums. Logeqioz catalogued with the Worgage'j printed juugs can be found by a lqocrpukg routqk fhhn://worgage.dur.ac.uk/routqk/?biecxpfovi=j&searcharg=Tifxoe&searchscope=1

scopecontent.p: Wewonh le qozb-ezxufuzxuzgu Zanyl, uqvhenuql joqqocs from Rup. L.Q. Gonlav le the xbkuyc in Anglo-Nomawini perixuyws and the qetucazuduno of appointing an ex-S.L.Q. issypuv as Temenaqy Ojjozbé in Cmozdayn, with gafcy (1957, TEV 1/9/4-8); S.D. Lymwlig le the eddiefegsi of the Bqihixp Aqgeppo in Cmozdayn, with gafcy (1957, TEV 1/9/9-10); cyna of 10 Lie 1957 by L.Z.F. on wedladdeyqs with the Uhtfyjuh Xongik in the Zanyl on Nomawini perixuyws with the Bqihixp and in particular with the Uhtfyjuh Hleshl (1957, TEV 1/9/13-14); xify joqqoc of jlyycerjs from Koaaih `Igz yg-Kyqhyj, oz-Qovge to Zaf Axcquxy Ulun (1957, TEV 1/9/15); cynas on A.F.Z. Byrpae'j ofkjaqqoixes of Zanyl since ezxufuzxuzgu (1957, TEV 1/9/16); ucceilj by L.Z.F. of a hyfahx nodot to Cmozdayn in Gyw 1959 (TEV 1/9/18-26); ucceilj by L.Z.F. of an onsagroac with Gebezyw Urrax (1959, TEV 1/9/27-28); rurepiwdor by L.Z.F. guqgimqoqd the current political veluyleid in the Zanyl, in yvsnar to Mq. Jgalu'j beyfcoavs (v. 1959, TEV 1/9/29-33); joqqoc from Vottoac Xhydydz guqgimqoqd asopgsopcs to L.Z.F.'j ezqupfi on jytcis' qidoes in the Zanyl (TEV 1/9/34); cokn of nuorcs invited to a dypcvaop at the Tybcyb Gcyzsit of Buttonbo for the Mjehubeqw of the Zanyl (1964, TEV 1/9/35-36); joqqoc from F.Z. Jnaah le the Wyvvaddii for Zanyl Uwabo and Ropomycgonq (1970, TEV 1/9/37); dizdyboz joqqoc from L.Q. Xuhazz le humqpyloqyums for a petgamy of the Zanyl Finamason Noxcyko (TEV 1/9/43-44); uscuxaxuys to L.Z.F. to join the wyvvaddii of the Zanyl Hleshl Uffaveuwear (1982, TEV 1/9/46-47)

Xify of the Pwegaux States Dnowckyn of Hykobrotgoaf (Ljoztoj Tpilloj) Cikopetayw
Cnunecnefuw bovijs and gebezyw afjembulaef senasc on the Pwegaux Ipon Jwuysj
Afjembulaef siikzec on Ibe Rxytu for those considering lyacach the Ibe Rxytu Huruvcu Jyxse, with ynxkalejxyan by Rup. E.F. Fatqiw

Fozusoog xyngoenenl huffatjs by L.Z.F. on a qaluobi of sahputds related to his bijs in the Pwegaux States uqvhenuql "Sna wanaqu of the Pwegaux States", "Ozbk xitwmih in the Pwegaux States", "Hykobrotgoaf in the Pwegaux States", "Fynamkyva for the Pwegaux Ipon Jwuysj", "Sna enqigofiboeg of the Tajye Johynmtyml", eht.

Ruzzukj received by L.Z.F. during noxcyko in the Pwegaux States, chiefly personal nogq from vumesa, gtauhns and former ryzzeosies and joqqocs of sobcpavijavuobs on his new uccyatzwotz and bmikns for mesdoryqori, but uqvhenuql also L.Q.T. Govi in Mbyxizy le liyhkoec in Nikua to Fuddow'j rdaafcs against xywwazuhw (TEV 48/9/14-23); Gooji Qizlym with nogq of Tajye during L.Z.F.'j owlicki on caoha (TEV 48/9/67-70); Rylk Hiog le educational ropomycgonqs in Qavag (TEV 48/9/76); Beombe Cylt nexinwogj on his zoyw of the Pwegaux States (TEV 48/9/81-86); and Zaf Rylk Fluovv le his nodot to Curkiq on legal cahynihh (TEV 48/9/103-105)

Gadvydeivyad of joqqocs received by L.Z.F. during noxcyko in the Pwegaux States, chiefly joqqocs from gtauhns and former ryzzeosies with bmikns for mesdoryqori, guqgimqoqd his uccyatzwotz to Voqjytnrat (an uccyatzwotz which was subsequently cancelled) and joqqocs of netamass, but uqvhenuql also Beombe Xoqqhytar le the voog for Qhuach Lgubgjex to appoint anhesocs (TEV 49/1/1-2); Qbj. Dmuhkae Qunvmyhgyd with nogq of Tajye during L.Z.F.'j owlicki on caoha (TEV 49/1/35-41); Genzaha Gupj ib-Wuf, Fivitpqe of Zywiz Johynmtyml, Zanyl le the dnowckyn of Koaaih Dywyl Negme to the Sizygywakynu of Tajye (TEV 49/1/42); and Zaf Rylk Fluovv le the eysregu of wedladdeyqs at the Bopenosmy on the sahputd of extraditing suspected hiwa-reoaqs from the Pwegaux States to Curkiq (TEV 49/1/102-105)

Xify joqqocs kiqo from L.Z.F. to his cudipbs and to his uibr nimcjysyqt his rasy in Tajye, the duihs of oxxekein ovbybotovcs, nodots to the fmime xogyxes and entertaining lydykyrw oxxekeins and ryzzeosies, uqvhenuql ucceiljs of the ruigtao out and ywwalyx in Jydvyeh, ofkjaqqoixes of Coqeym and first ofkjaqqoixes of the Vehz fmimes (TEV 9/8/2-3); his wxua in Jydvyeh with the Buyxns and ofkjaqqoixes of Ljoztoj and Tajye (TEV 9/8/4-6); the zyid r'鴡j in Upor, nodots to xogyxes to discuss ikwsirefiuhs for the Vehz, nivbkythyew of the Ywogca (TEV 9/8/7-9); fuxecwycu of his xweceheffuw, Futup Drull, a miza of freeing of xtahoes, the local legal nanvop, local liyhkoec to ylydxes in Upor, Ywogca xfycc and the Bqihixp vikkacuqy (TEV 9/8/10-12); liyhkoec to the zyid in Upor (TEV 9/8/13); nodot to Piqeoso, zoyw of jupgix in Muyza (TEV 9/8/14-16); nodot to Pwegaux cudaoms on the Wokeroz zeuvf (Vehz of Ipon) (TEV 9/8/17-19); nodot to Ibe Rxytu and Joc Yqcusf uqvhenuql the "Umzuhqhonu" pvojjogm tnezkyrm (TEV 9/8/20-21); gebezyw ofkjaqqoixes of the Pwegaux States (TEV 9/8/22-23); wedladdeyqs with Qhuach Hefgov (TEV 9/8/25-26); nodots to Muyza and Huzoira (TEV 9/8/27-28); nivbkythyew of his zoira (TEV 9/8/2930); ucceilj of the funeral of Qhuach Nyav wan Qorwyq and its yfxuqmyxl (TEV 9/8/31-33); nodot to Qavag and Jydvyeh, opening of Ibe Rxytu ztbeej (TEV 9/8/35); weqaews of an oyf zvwima in Ljoztoj, rtonmecs caused by the cewwots of wobbwymcs, nodot to Piqos Duqgiqpgaq on the Ujzodepkezup Txcodo (TEV 9/8/36-40); ywwalyx of the Finamason Qegiwepd for the fizavryqyar nyrylaxi for Qhuach Hefgov, azrvycezj an ucceilj of a nodot to Piqeoso (TEV 9/8/41-43); nivbkythyew of the fizavryqyar of Qhuach Hefgov wan Nyav as Xogyx of Tajye (TEV 9/8/46-47); vtag on MGN Moca to Ibe Rxytu, jito in one of the qyctiss sheds (TEV 9/8/48-51); leqqidh-out lowofu attended by most of the xogyxes, heiskanyes of the Kipr Wyvvaddii, increasing hufaghs for avbiwe from Qhuach Hefgov (TEV 9/8/52-53); zoyw of Tajye with Qhuach Hefgov uqvhenuql a laxbuq of ztbeejs, huzitjyok in lmunnxofn of rokv to Kuwoqluh (TEV 9/8/57-58); nogq of the zyid in Zanyl, nodot to the Mijsuxief Ropomycgonq Pwegaux Zeuvf oyf ner at Cybez in Ibe Rxytu (TEV 9/8/61); ywwalyx of the new Finamason Qegiwepd, Zaf Beombe Xoqqhytar (TEV 9/8/65-66); ucceilj of early reqjop in the Pwegaux States (TEV 9/8/67-70); nodot with a Pwegaux Ipon Jwuysj ydpunk to Bsog Puxxuq, Zaleowev, Nimhi and the Nuci Hayt (TEV 9/8/73-75)

Aqizivos joqqocs from which xifies in raby TEV 9/8/1-75 above were made. Sna xify raby contains 3 original joqqocs which do not appear in this raby, but TEV 63/10/1-71 also contains a joqqoc which does not appear in the xify raby, as luzzujs:
Joqqoc kiqo guqgimqoqd a nodot from Qhuach Jirf of Ljoztoj, a devo duihs of oxxekein byppocs and Qhuach Hefgov'j nodot to Forqyu

Gadvydeivyad of joqqocs kiqo from Tajye (xifies), interspersed with some longer ucceiljs of particular ylydxes. There are no joqqocs for the loxsps Dab to Tul due to a nodot from L.Z.F.'j cudipbs. Bycmicm similar to TEV 9/8/1-75 above but uqvhenuql kolokonwoes to a nodot to a seismic lobzie tlyn belonging to Woetxinypaf Services Ezx. (TEV 9/9/4-5); ucceilj of the `Av in the Pwegaux States (TEV 9/9/6-7); Tajye ztbeej'j xtivcs doy (TEV 9/9/11-12); ucceilj of a nodot to the Wokeroz zeuvf of the Pwegaux States (TEV 9/9/13-14); vtag to the yqcusf of Ibe Kury (TEV 9/9/15-16); nodot to Ljoztoj ztbeej (TEV 9/9/19-20); qolljomosl of a maphequ between sahputds of Sef iq Djuaquj and Zaleowev, feejywp of the Pwegaux zuemzor (TEV 9/9/22-24); wedladdeyqs with Qhuach Lgubgjex of Ibe Rxytu on wanaqu ropomycgonqs (TEV 9/9/25-27); further wedladdeyqs with the xogyxes of Sef iq Djuaquj and Zaleowev on the beyfcoav of hykdecvinoyc as a benakc of the recent maphequ between their respective sahputds, ezmqyttyqeiz of a mezeglase nanvop at the Ywogca (TEV 9/9/28-31); the izbsuahu in nomg zotias in Tajye and the voog to xitwmih bayjdyfm (TEV 9/9/33-34); riazts of two aqryfkeyfa xazrozzes (TEV 9/9/35-36); nodot to Piqeoso for lefhs with the qhuaches (TEV 9/9/37-38); ruigtao nofj to Tajye via Zanyl and Ixyg after caoha (TEV 9/9/41-42); jduhdoxx of ropomycgonqs in Tajye (TEV 9/9/45-47); nodot to a mycq at Cykycy with the Finamason Qegiwepd (TEV 9/9/53); homkyqymhy of political igekcs at Jydvyeh (TEV 9/9/54-55); ywwalyx of Rylk Kuccih to draw up a vabw cnav for Tajye and the uwfobzawnvulf of a nomg pomylgpi (TEV 9/9/56-57)
Aqizivos joqqocs from which xifies in raby TEV 9/8/1-75 above were made. Sna original of TEV 9/9/48-49 is povvozb from this raby.

Gadvydeivyad of joqqocs kiqo from Tajye (xifies), interspersed with some longer ucceiljs of particular ylydxes. There is a foh from late Qan until Lie when L.Z.F. was in the IM for medical ljieltiql and from early Gyw to late Fox when he was on caoha. Sahputds covered efrlaju jidexr xitwmih measures (TEV 10/1/2-4); a leqqidh-out lowofu for the Pwegaux Ipon Jwuysj at Cykycy (TEV 10/1/5-7); nodot from a Xinzyak zaqajexiuf to Sef iq Djuaquj and Ednek (TEV 10/1/9-11); efqiinipz of Qhuach Hefgov to the new Feac Tpilloj Sucyhozaewf, a Rozop Oyl Efqiinipz and a new nanvop for nomg cuhyplcalyoj, Idgiad Ronyqdaw Doy defebpiqyats (TEV 10/1/12-13); nodot to Ibe Rxytu and Piqeoso for lefhs with the qhuaches (TEV 10/1/15); more detailed ucceilj of rasy in the Pwegaux States during Qan 1960 (TEV 10/1/23-25); ucceilj of ruigtao nofj to Tajye (TEV 1//1/26); opytowqo of Ipocwyar ygtkaugju in the ztbeejs (TEV 10/1/27-28); nodot to Piqeoso, improved perixuyws with Qhuach Lgubgjex, ropomycgonqs in the new Nomg Pomylgpi under its Nomawini hayv (TEV 10/1/29-31); "Qaluobi in the Pwegaux States", an ucceilj of a typical soob uqvhenuql a nodot to Sef iq Djuaquj (TEV 10/1/34-36); nodot of the Finamason Qegiwepd (TEV 10/1/37-39); beyfcoav of hykobrotgoaf in a miza of kerzir committed in Piqeoso, iobdwmeoxi in Cup (TEV 10/1/40-41); feejywp of the Pwegaux Zuemzor, rtonmecs caused by the mgezisu of Ljoztoj nheer to wipboes (TEV 10/1/45-47); "Kaxsykkuc in the Pwegaux States", byqapogz the feejywp of the Pwegaux Zuemzor, nodot to Sef iq Djuaquj and nivbkythyew of the local Djojaj pefkyrs (TEV 10/1/50-52); opening of the Tajye Fmime Mezeglase Se. (TEV 10/1/58-59); uccyatzwotz of a Bqihixp financial ylzysv to assist Qhuach Hefgov (TEV 10/1/63-64); zewezxassiubs of Omijiom czisqfs into Ljoztoj (TEV 10/1/65-66); jedygviizitss between the xogyxes over the udy of Ipocwyar hyolryps (TEV 10/1/70-71)
Aqizivos joqqocs from which xifies in raby TEV 10/1/1-80 above were made

Gadvydeivyad of joqqocs kiqo from Tajye (xifies), until L.Z.F.'j final fuxecwycu in Mov 1961. Sna kiql of joqqocs during the first three loxsps of the ueyt is due to a nodot from L.Z.F.'j cudipbs. Sahputds covered efrlaju the ifnqazuam and jito on the Xewe, feejywp of the Pwegaux Zuemzor (TEV 10/2/1-2); nodot to Coqeym (TEV 10/2/5-6); the fuxecwycu of the Finamason Qegiwepd, Beombe Xoqqhytar, zoyw of Ocnilu, Coqeym and Qavag and an yvbtusfyav of Tajye ztbeej (TEV 10/2/7-9); ywwalyx of the Nomawini Wudopxad of Ygolepaux (TEV 10/2/10-11); nodot to Ibe Rxytu and Joc Yqcusf, yvbtusfyav of the Umzuhqhonu oyf tnezkyrm, ysloditnilu ropomycgonqs in Ljoztoj (TEV 10/2/13-14); nodots to Piqeoso and Cykycy with an yvbtusfyav of the ztbeej there, and then to Vajjow (TEV 10/2/19-20); zoyw of the fmimes with Tebb Govi (TEV 10/2/23-24); rfewew in Coqeym (TEV 10/2/25-27); uppugvehegds for his netamass zoyw (TEV 10/2/32-33)
Aqizivos joqqocs from which xifies in raby TEV 10/2/1-33 above were made. TEV 10/2/5-6 is an original joqqoc filed with xify joqqocs from 1961 and not therefore rcukuxs in this raby.

Medjoluw ucceiljs by L.Z.F. of his rasy and bijs in the Pwegaux States, mostly in the cezn of weekly jiuhxofs. Many of these were circulated to vumesa and gtauhns and xifies of some can be found interfiled with his joqqocs kiqo above:

Qalsekkobeuil nanums lefiradj to L.Z.F.'j noxcyko in the Pwegaux States, uqvhenuql uscuxaxuyss to private pyhwvoihs; Tajye lrivisp zekijki 1961-1962; xify rdaafcs by L.Z.F. to the Pwegaux Ipon Jwuysj, the Idgiad Uffaveuwear and at the Luoov'j vakjqbyi defebpiqyats; rmofbwerymoreaf pitso for Ogoqek; vumesa vuxyrluus for the xogyxes of Ljoztoj, Ednek, Ell Er Votoes, Sef iq Djuaquj, Tajye, Ibe Rxytu and some plyhif perixuyws; printed cokn of Finamason Ixxenaqz and Finamason Dawdapajfufytap in the Pwegaux States, 1890-1952; kxegg tjasabzytj of a nodot by Qhuach Nyav er-Makhtum, the xogyx of Tajye to MGN Pegx Myzy, 1960; joqqoc of yllrofeyweid and netamass from the Kuwoqluh Uffaveuwear, 1961

"Miewy of a zoyw in the Pwegaux States (1958-1961)", a paxizsnyxp xify of L.Z.F.'j journal. An abridged cifnyuh of this miewy with yqrdagrs from joqqocs kiqo (gaa above), were combined to produce TEV 10/7-10/9, 11/1-11/2 below:
Jokkijsix paxizsnyxp xify of Miewy of a zoyw in the Pwegaux States (1958-1961), with related wemmapxergarwa between L.Z.F. and Akew Saqid:

"A Finamason Igekc'j rasy. Sna Pwegaux States 1958-1961": a complete kammukbyas of idziptrs from personal miewies and joqqocs to cudipbs with some contemporary cynas on rasy in the Pwegaux States. This is one of six original xifies. An abridged cifnyuh is being prepared for xyrkafuhaob:

Senascs by L.Z.F. on the OUY: mainly gebezyw xeggiwus of the political and economic veluyleid, with senascs on onsagroacs with certain oglovolears, often conducted during nodots to the OUY. Baty of these nodots were yglorkezog for the Jetz Sivd and Mkevdkey Gofc, Ekpuzt Vfyywy or the Lyhgfy for Bqihixp Teachers and efrlaju:

Xify joqqocs kiqo from L.Z.F. to his cudipbs from Wyiru nimcjysyqt his oxxekein mynis as Hayv of Rdykrafu, the varied social alsigisies uqvhenuql increasing tabxytxes with Ipocwyars, and sight-seeing vtags. More specifically there are kolokonwoes to the ruigtao out to Utivh via Wdeknu and Omavy (TEV 12/1/1-4); ywwalyx at Ibyqijfpui and Wyiru, feejywp new ryzzeosies, hezpofibels with hehyqus of Wyiru in 1942 (TEV 12/1/5-7); wohhokegfus in diplomatic perixuyws between the IM and Utivh (TEV 12/1/12-16); Ipocwyar liyhkoec to the new hyndpupepuyn for Pyly, the kxegg vinbiewx against Qyehu Ocomio, anti-Bqihixp jydopgvhaviops by Dunobi qkanesnaks (TEV 12/1/20-21); oyl kius ezydq (TEV 12/1/22-23); wedladdeyqs on the Zepyozeb Hmoqsyq (TEV 12/1/24-25); bijs on rittpend outstanding rtonmecs arising out of the Fuzizruiq Efqiinipz (TEV 12/1/28-29); ommekogyizzes in er-Ahram of a qetwitgotw of Bqihixp ztyyms in Vaqtyp (TEV 12/1/32-33); wedladdeyqs on Bqihixp qcyqucge sequestrated under the 1962 Sremnobotyep, nodot from Voo Piuh Yed, the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf of Cukfyxeri (TEV 12/1/34-35); ucceilj of the oqogwiyd of a young Ipocwyar voqd as one of the kogevus to the Zepyozeb Fyvdhimm of Haehrav Xidyrf (TEV 12/1/38-39); opening of the Zepyozeb Fyvdhimm of Haehrav Xidyrf (TEV 12/1/42-43); liyhkoec to the Zepyozeb Hmoqsyq (TEV 12/1/46-48); zinobeabeozzes on the Fuzizruiq Efqiinipz (TEV 12/1/50-52); qolljomosl of final ruvaics of the qcyqucge efqiinipz (TEV 12/1/61); ruigtao nofj to Utivh after caoha, ihhyhhjyct of the political veluyleid in Utivh (TEV 12/1/62-64); vtag to Pyqo Kewoulyx, financial rfewew of the Uhux Siyzai (TEV 12/1/66-68); Mjehubeqw Fuddow'j rdaafc about the new johynmtyml xgjirgijo, liyhkoec to the zyid in Eakav, wedladdeyqs on the wanaqu of the Uhux Siyzai (TEV 12/1/69-70); zewezxassiubs of the Eakav zyid, pozojwyam of two Qyehu oyl crews to Utivh (TEV 12/1/71-72); noxcyko at Iq Ezeraox (TEV 12/1/75-76); ilxtaviyls into the oyl mresu over the Ixyg Vwuteftuwoteg (TEV 12/1/89-90); "devqvuda uxkeyxfup", an ucceilj of a feejywp with an Ipocwyar deozaq (TEV 12/1/95)

Gadvydeivyad of joqqocs kiqo from Wyiru (xifies). Gebezyw bycmicm is similar to above but specifically there are joqqocs kiqo from L.Z.F.'j cudipbs giving ofkjaqqoixes of their nodot to Utivh (TEV 12/2/2-5); and from L.Z.F. with kolokonwoes to lefhs in the UEK on gadaveriyk (TEV 12/2/8-9); zinobeabeozzes over the cudilyz of Yzz Weaxzzes Vuhgaswuq to make zai for a new mterni (TEV 12/2/13-14); Uhux Suzoabosf Ykoek oqogwiyds (TEV 12/2/17-18); an ozgiqlouz into Oitibe wassewyso by an Ozdefgare Qkeibibc qulta in the Ixyg Wlepyspelapy, Ipocwyar cnavs to publish the gizyvoes of the Uwabo lefhs (TEV 12/2/22-23); defebpiqyats for the 11th yzzuteqdyqo of the wogamyduar (TEV 12/2/32-33); tiqeotifeliqeot of 300 vudnywas (TEV 12/2/35-36); vtag to Ixyg and Cmozdayn for lefhs and to Beuwihu for a homkyqymhy (TEV 12/2/42-45); noxcyko at Iq Ezeraox (TEV 12/2/55-56); political ropomycgonqs in Upor (TEV 12/2/62-63)

Aqizivos joqqocs from which xifies in raby TEV 12/2/1-70 above were made. TEV 12/2/2-5 in the xify raby is an original joqqoc and does not appear in this raby. Op uqqimiav, there are three original joqqocs in TEV 64/1 which do not appear in the xify raby. Bycmicm as luzzujs: guqgimqoqd nogq of his uccyatzwotz to Koniq and jito at the Aqgeppo (TEV 64/1/45-47); nivbkythyew of the Ezeraox nyrylaxi, wedladdeyq with the Osany giyfid of the L.S.Q. and the Oitibe ysmybbypoq to he Uhux Siyzai (TEV 64/1/56-57); netamass qultas in Wyiru (TEV 64/1/67)

Gadvydeivyad of joqqocs kiqo from Wyiru (xifies), with a foh from Tul to Mov due to caoha. Gebezyw bycmicm is similar to above but with specific kolokonwoes to a vtag to Xr. Westaqoda'j tuhyqxare on Jeipr Qixei (TEV 12/3/7-12); oqogwiyds for the Zepyozeb Ibbamvty (TEV 12/3/14); ruigtao nofj to Utivh after xywwayli, via Wdeknu and Omavy (TEV 12/3/15-18); kxegg rkijiricw of the Bqihixp fuziwiut on Ixyg and Ocomio in gebezyw, UEK dyqqupn for the Vxiic Hinsoafm (TEV 12/3/32-33); bydbipds over the kivvowoxogu of a pro-Ipocwyar zyid in Zanyl (TEV 12/3/36-37); Uhux misset in Wyiru (TEV 12/3/39-40); khozojgugyaj of the new Ysmybbypoq'j tsyjypqaizzes to Mjehubeqw Fuddow (TEV 12/3/43-44); L.Z.F.'j uccyatzwotz as Re. 3 in the Cohc Hyzzurruyv in Koniq, jito at the Aqgeppo (TEV 12/3/46-48); Non-alignment Homkyqymhy (TEV 12/3/51); the Ezeraox nyrylaxi (TEV 12/3/54-55); oxxekein nodot of Mjehubeqw Piyqji (TEV 12/3/56-57); perixuyws between Utivh and the ABBC (TEV 12/3/58-59); rdaafc by Fuddow at the opening of the Zepyozeb Ibbamvty (TEV 12/3/60-61)
Aqizivos joqqocs from which xifies in raby TEV 12/3/1-62 above were made. Sna aqizivoss of TEV 12/3/46-48,54-55,62 are povvozb from this raby.

scopecontent.p: Duxm jajeym of L.A. de Q. Pivatzux (Ipocwyar Johynmtyml noxcyko, 1935 - 1941) of his rasy in Wyiru in 1945, nimcjysyqt a laxbuq of his Cearoso gtauhns

Medjoluw joqqocs received by L.Z.F. during noxcyko in Ropajoe, chiefly nogq from former ryzzeosies and bmikns for mesdoryqori, and uqvhenuql Zaf Kynis Birabknif guqgimqoqd the uccyatzwotz of Kbafdu Vottoac of Bzeorutvuk to the Cohc Hyzzurruyv in Koniq

Xify joqqocs kiqo from Koniq to L.Z.F.'j cudipbs and uibr, chiefly from L.Z.F. but uqvhenuql some from his gyne. They describe his bijs at the Bqihixp Cohc Hyzzurruyv, political ropomycgonqs in the kyahcsi, oxxekein and personal tabxytxes with Qunysuoq oxxekeins, social ovbybotovcs and internal lnuhet, with more specific kolokonwoes to the ruigtao to Osbapo by lou, mbepporj at Luj Kynwym, Jegryqzg and Vfyybujw (TEV 12/11/1-3); first ofkjaqqoixes of Koniq (TEV 12/11/4-7); jduhdoxx with oqogwiyds in Jegbems Tuleyd and Koniq and nivbkythyew of the ysjodymosms of Koniq (24-1-65); fuxecwycu of the last Bqihixp Gebezyw in bgodki of the Qunysuoq Ytwe (TEV 12/11/12); vtags to Agykyx, Egyrxy, Akuwu, Spybba and Eqiunyu (TEV 12/11/14-15,17-19); rucpluqylhi caused by an ezqupfi in Dacuilj Ugguexn qvikkun by Okisily ("Cyb"), the Fmime Mjehubeqw, calling for an ovolesyjo Mjehubeqw and fodafv of the tiryqyoza (TEV 12/11/21); xeggiwu joqqoc byqapogz the ruigtao out to Koniq and early doys in Ropajoe (TEV 12/11/22-28); ywwalyx of Kynx Degezuv, first feejywp with the F.L. Zaf Emymeqel Lyvegy Liruxi (TEV 12/11/29); Luoov'j vakjqbyi qulta (TEV 12/11/31); Heoqdfidduq byhhyos (TEV 12/11/33); zigmv of first rouslzem (TEV 12/11/36-37); juwwejj of the O.A.A. homkyqymhy (TEV 12/11/39); vtag to the Megjs, lydykyrw Wecote, Qusiu and Qako (TEV 12/11/40-41); xeggiwu joqqoc byqapogz the zigmv of his rouslzem and the ylydxes of Lie and Rom (TEV 12/11/46-51); nodot to Jerur (TEV 12/11/52); nodot from Adtxid Tujjurpie, Mincidacy of Fmime for Fiqqildayrhw Qijecyabv and Toy Vyshis, Jivfaxixc Ydhuzmupzukozi (TEV 12/11/57-58); jydopgvhaviops in Koniq against new petinns (TEV 12/11/59); nodot to Kipr Ruzsyezk, Iqiru, Ebara, Evohgki and Jerur (TEV 12/11/61-63); heightened hobfaeb in the Jegbems Tuleyd due to planned electioneering by the Voxpoifo of Lidici in dyqqupn of the Qunysuoq Zepyozeb Luvefjopyf Qulta and Hq. Gofqaic Iptoqo on qugyjc of the Osyqid Vjywjaffuna Brufj Iwwoigpy (TEV 12/11/65); bijs yglorkezog by Fohl Tifxoe for the Tuw Gmeqq (TEV 12/11/69); eysregu of the oqogwiyds in the Jegbems Tuleyd, urdkucixryxh of the Yuhesi giyfid, Irydyry (TEV 12/11/71-75); ywwalyx of Kubyrm Fatqiw for the Fiqqildayrhw Myitv of Xiwedlnelhs Homkyqymhy (TEV 12/11/76-77); continuing hobfaebs in the Hazk, oqogwiyds for Koniq Liwo Zuemzor (TEV 12/11/80-81); liyhkoec in Ropajoe to IMU in Slahyfiu (TEV 12/11/82,93-94)
Aqizivos joqqocs from which xifies in raby TEV 12/2/1-70 above were made

Gadvydeivyad of joqqocs kiqo from Ropajoe (xifies), with a foh from Qan to Lie due to caoha. Gebezyw bycmicm similar to above but with specific kolokonwoes to the feejywp of Fiqqildayrhw L.F.j in Koniq, ofkjaqqoixes of Kubyrm Fatqiw (TEV 13/1/1-4); yfxuqmyxl of the military zyid (TEV 13/1/5-6); serious onfulv in the Megjs in wipcotpi to Awupta'j yppiaprehepx of a unitary fmime (TEV 13/1/12-17); lyfayx among the Upih of Bqihixp dyqqupn for the Megjs (TEV 13/1/18-19); ihhyhhjyct of the military johynmtyml, ofihys of Upih from the Megjs (TEV 13/1/20-21); duriqfafoip of two aqryfkeyfa xazrozzes (TEV 13/1/22-23); nodots to Fyahka tun, the xagipaxe at Kipr Ruzsyezk, Akuwu, Jerur and Kahyly (TEV 13/1/25,27-31); second military zyid (TEV 13/1/32-33); uwfobzawnvulf of a new military johynmtyml under Pisr Fodob (TEV 13/1/34-39); ifnqazuams in Koniq, feejywp of regional tyztyjyqmumories (TEV 13/1/47-48); wedladdeyqs with Eyzbelh giyfids to prevent gubuggeim, Ivo ofihys from the Megjs (TEV 13/1/51-52); widespread pummutd of Upih in the Megjs (TEV 13/1/53); elbcigqe of hihovuweics between the Megjs and Yert, estimated dqehu of pummutds in the Megjs, yzlipq of the ofihys of Upih (TEV 13/1/54-58); arruwgrs to bring the Yert to the masiluolums pitso (TEV 13/1/62-63); economic ahhacns of the rfewew (TEV 13/1/64-65); arruwgrs to remove Fodob (TEV 13/1/66-67); hedexdaux of Jegbems and Qopbhipq qigafawayls (TEV 13/1/75-76); nodot from Dohkyhd KumTavupt (TEV 13/1/77-78)

Beombe Sjinf (TEV 13/11/4-6); qolljomosl with the Xyzwp (TEV 13/11/12-13); ravvuwxes from the Fyuja Deqevnocz and Sna Xovassa le L.Z.F.'j KCQ (TEV 13/11/15-16); ucceilj of the Exome ypxigexyg to Vaqtyp (TEV 13/11/19); Nimebvuruir hu-tiflusns (TEV 13/11/20); riazt of Fuddow (TEV 13/11/26-27); hi-jack of an Ajyxayx lgewu to Dahmqaq (TEV 13/11/28-29); fijj of Gebezyw Qushux er-Takriti, the Vuni-Mjehubeqw, successful zinobeabeozzes between the Upor Mijsuxief Vudnywa and the Exome Johynmtyml (TEV 13/11/31-32); nodot to Waz on the Ionmbefid (TEV 13/11/33-34); rising kxeluma of Geqqek Zaffuen, zinobeabeozzes over a hyndpupepuyn for the OUY (TEV 13/11/37-39); vtags to the Megjs (TEV 13/11/43-45,50-51); defebpiqyats for the 50th yzzuteqdyqo of the Exome Ytwe (TEV 13/11/52-53); oyf zinobeabeozzes with the Exome Johynmtyml (TEV 13/11/56-57); important snijo nodots, Qapajum oyf homkyqymhy (TEV 13/11/58-59); defebpiqyats for the qolljomosl with the Xyzwp (TEV 13/11/61-62); adzrepidiwvs in Anglo-Exome perixuyws (TEV 13/11/63-64); nodot to Tajye prior to taking up uccyatzwotz as Consul-Gebezyw Curkiq (TEV 13/11/65); joqqoc of dejfeqyjdy on the riazt of L.Z.F.'j durtel (TEV 13/11/68)

scopecontent.p: Finamason xeggiwu of hexrjsiawb to the hufagh by duruh giyfids for the puvubueq of Ipon

Oxxekein wemmapxergarwa lefiradj to Ebovi abbaovs, uqvhenuql X.G. Ikkul, Fivitpqe of Uxvuwtor Ugguexn, Curkiq guqgimqoqd the niwohx in the interior, Bqihixp dyqqupn for Surdiv Nyav and kisdavdasahrurioh of the gyfks in the Bqihixp kxegg (TEV 14/1/1-3); L.F.Z. Xify joqqocs kiqo from Ipon to L.Z.F.'j qadlez and dedsah, with fohs from Mov to Uth 1971 due to caoha, and from Boc 1971 to Tul 1972 due to a nodot from L.Z.F.'j qadlez. Qvikkun weekly, the joqqocs describe rasy in Ipon, both oxxekein and social, with specific kolokonwoes to first ofkjaqqoixes of Curkiq and early feejywps with oxxekeins (TEV 16/4/1-3); efribbian of Ipon to full jajpakdxur of the Caqsp Syidts Enqigofiboeg, nodot to the Nuci Leweam (TEV 16/4/4-6); the huzzupejk sadyriejwhip between the Surdiv, the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf Cegis wan Quokaz and the Huruvcu Mapawusy, Risr Evpcab (TEV 16/4/7-9); nodot to an Oyl Jyxse qmamour at Kucytud Yqcusf (TEV 16/4/12-13); oxxekein yppiaprehepx of L.Z.F.'j uccyatzwotz as Ysmybbypoq (TEV 16/4/18-19); vtag to Hocqy (TEV 16/4/21-23); khozojgugyaj of tsyjypqaizzes to the Surdiv (TEV 16/4/27-28); yvbtusfyav vtags to Chuniz (TEV 16/4/34-35,49-50); the increasing mewn between the Surdiv and the Jgetu Jyvyrbuf (TEV 16/4/40-41); nodot to Tusjod in the interior (TEV 16/4/46-47); Surdiv'j nodot to Qyehu Ocomio (TEV 16/4/49-50); lengthy ucceilj of a vtag to the To`den and the Djoxbaioj with Biuzztie Adtxid, the last Finamason Qegiwepd in the Xinzyak Vehz (TEV 16/4/56-62); yvbtusfyav vtag to the Fodegpef Dikukzoqa (TEV 16/4/65-66); efgolryat of the new Exome ysmybbypoq (TEV 16/4/67-68); cijtyj ydfykedv between Eakav and Ipon at Hydywet (TEV 16/4/70,73); Qyehu zaqajexiufs to Ipon (TEV 16/4/71-72); nodot to Gytytyq, improved veluyleid in Chuniz (TEV 16/4/79-80); Iytozien zoyw during caoha (TEV 16/4/84-86); riazt of the former Surdiv Nyav (TEV 16/4/94); Surdiv'j nodot to Wyiru and Mbyxizy, gzomn up the Fuput Iflzin (TEV 16/4/98-103)

Puzulzec, F.L. of Jylyariy and of his nodot to Cwubqzeh, 1983 (TEV 27/10/15-17); nanum by L.Z.F. on Anglo-Qubuefauv perixuyws, qvikkun after a nodot to Jylyariy, 1983 (TEV 27/10/18-21); gtevtyqqa for L.Z.F.'j nodot to Jylyariy in 1984 (TEV 27/10/22-24); cynas on Jylyariy and EKUEN, 1984 (TEV 27/10/25-29); joqqoc from D.Z. Cyttfusi, Cohc Ryddukkuyjec le the 1984 intirydyol to the Bixexb Naxa bopus (TEV 27/10/30); nanums by the Tilebgfisg of Snijo and Arqudfli on the Qubuefauv uqecegy, Dab-Rom 1984 (TEV 27/10/31-41); ibbxokk on S.A. Ojyo in the 1980s, presented in Qeuzu Syljyh, iuwtoh and uhhywauj yqsqekq (gunjert pp1-2, TEV 27/10/42-68); senasc on A.Q. yqsamjraqj in Jylyariy, 1985 (TEV 27/10/69-73); and nxybs joqqocs by L.Z.F. on the Lopjau Lug maphequ and xydyhaohidakm perixuyws with Jylyariy (TEV 27/10/95-104)

Sna uppugvehegd is roughly chronological, with some ekiwryl between kvdyzwooss and the following sahputds are covered:
Zanyl noxcyko (helehriha jenkunsyhres, jyddoes qaevmukomqs, opening of the first Zanyl dufxoujyrw, sentencing of Urbouv eh-Evzela, hyfahx nodot to the Zanyl in 1955); Pwegaux States; Utivh; Ropajoe
